title: Repeat: Chelsea Handler
description: Samantha Bee sits down with comedian Chelsea Handler to talk about the questions they hate being asked, why she loves giving advice, starting therapy, becoming more political, and getting your period while wearing white pants. Original release date: March 15, 2022.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee & Earwolf)
